originalText.text: Dr. Alison Gruen is amazing! Friendly. Personable. Knows what's she's doing.  And you don't have to wear those surgical paper robes if you don't want / need to. I highly recommend her.

text.text: Dr. Alison Gruen is amazing! Friendly. Personable. Knows what's she's doing.  And you don't have to wear those surgical paper robes if you don't want / need to. I highly recommend her.

originalText.text: I saw Dr. Gruen today. My first time come to and I found all staff here are so nice and friendly. Dr. Gruen is the nicest dermatologist I have even seen. She is professional, warm, kind and very helpful. She helps me inject my acne scar, recommended a very professional pharmacy and laser treatment to me. She tried her best to help me avoid high cost but get the very best treatment. Dr. Gruen has a such a warm , kind and generous heart. I appreciate it a lot. I believe that‚Äôs why all her staff in this office are so nice too. Great people make a difference. Thank you all.

originalText.text:
This office is amazing ! The administrative team at the reception desk are warm and professional, and DR. ALISON GRUEN and her medical
Assistant SHIRA are outstanding ! Brilliant, compassionate, fully engaged and top shelf educated ( YALE , I asked üòù) my contact dermatitis is gone today with the RIGHT cream ! I will be back for a lot more !
Thank you

originalText.text: Dr was very nice. Person at the reception was  RUDE from beginning to end.

text.text: Dr was very nice. Person at the reception was  RUDE from beginning to end.

originalText.text: I had a FANTASTIC first appointment with Dr. Gruen. Not only was she able to give me context on my concerns, she also took one look at another spot I had had for over 10 years and told me there is a medication to treat it! Every other doctor I had gone to ignored my concerns and referred to the issue as non harmful and therefore not requiring treatment. If you are a brown person like myself, I HIGHLY reccomend her. She has done extensive study on patients of color, and knows the skin conditions that affect them more than the white population. On top of her knowledge, she has fantastic bedside manners, made me feel like I was just talking to a friend. She is bubbly, patient, and never makes you feel rushed out. Will be coming back if I ever need a dermatologist again :)

text.text: I had a FANTASTIC first appointment with Dr. Gruen. Not only was she able to give me context on my concerns, she also took one look at another spot I had had for over 10 years and told me there is a medication to treat it! Every other doctor I had gone to ignored my concerns and referred to the issue as non harmful and therefore not requiring treatment. If you are a brown person like myself, I HIGHLY reccomend her. She has done extensive study on patients of color, and knows the skin conditions that affect them more than the white population. On top of her knowledge, she has fantastic bedside manners, made me feel like I was just talking to a friend. She is bubbly, patient, and never makes you feel rushed out. Will be coming back if I ever need a dermatologist again :)
